definition: see 百孔千瘡|百孔千疮[bai3 kong3 qian1 chuang1]
wound/skin ulcer/(fig.) the desolation of trauma/desolation in the aftermath of a disaster
heavily damaged/(fig.) full of holes/riddled with problems
lit. bumps and bruises everywhere (idiom); fig. an ugly shambles/devastation everywhere
to cut one's flesh to cover a sore (idiom); faced with a current crisis, to make it worse by a temporary expedient

sentences.english: Even the dogs came and licked his sores.
Patients at risk of developing pressure sores did not get appropriate care.
sentences.chinese: 有患压疮风险的病人没有得到合适的护理。

sentences.english: The most common type of corrosion on aluminum and magnesium alloys is pitting.
sentences.chinese: 铝合金和镁合金最常见的锈蚀腐蚀是疮孔。

sentences.english: Androgens increase sebum production, which results in oily skin and acne.
sentences.chinese: 雄激素增加皮脂产生，导致油性皮肤和唑疮。

sentences.english: The first bowl of God's anger is sores on the bodies of people who worshiped the beast.
sentences.chinese: 盛神大怒的第一碗让拜兽之人的身上长了疮。

sentences.english: On the other hand, this young driver had ugly sores on his head.
sentences.chinese: 而这个年轻骡夫的头上还生着疮疖。

sentences.english: Medical have sore eyes, but pluck heartstrings.
sentences.chinese: 医得眼前疮，剜却心头肉。

sentences.english: Li Jie St. frankly pressure to gastric perforation, a wound mole even have relapsed .
sentences.chinese: 李杰圣坦言压力大到胃穿孔，连痣疮都复发。

sentences.english: Conclusion Sanhuang-calamine mixture yields satisfactory results in treating newborn's abscess and curtails the course of the disease and therefore worth popularization.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察三黄炉甘石混合液治疗新生儿脓疱疮的效果。

sentences.english: My mother had an open sore on her bosom due to inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 因为上火她的前胸生了个很大的疮。

sentences.english: I suddenly discovered something: was that a boil at the back of Daddy's neck?
sentences.chinese: 我蓦地发现，爸爸脖子后面怎么长了一个疮？

definition: ulcer or sore of venereal origin
(of a sore etc) to fester/to ulcerate
